titleStmt.title: The knave of clubs. Otherwise called, A game at cards, and clubs trump. Doe you not see the knave turn'd up? rub and lose cards. Play faire, and above board.
titleStmt.author: Wither, George, 1588-1667.

publicationStmt.publisher: Shuffled, cut, and dealt faire, by Stysichorus,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to George Wither in the Wrenn catalogue.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
